accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Kheel Center Triangle Fire Centennial Commemoration Collection. New York State Museum. #6317/021. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: The Triangle Shirtwaist Fire: A Centennial Commemoration

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: March 25, 2011. Clark Auditorium, New York State Museum, Albany, NY. Program of the event. Includes the names and biographical data of all the fire victims. 3 copies.
